11:04 <MasterPiece> has quit  
11:17 <Pbas> Hi, I want to PRing a new webjar: http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|org.webjars.bower|bootstrap-select|1.10.0|jar on git repository (this PR incomplete for the moment) but I didn't found a way/doc to do it  
11:17 <Pbas> the better I found is http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/WebJars+Integration  
11:18 <Pbas> but I don't know hwo to do this (where I must copy/create my pom.xml for example)  
11:20 <Pbas> my jar contains some maven stuff (pom.xml on META-INF/maven/ subdirectory)  
11:20 <Pbas> Of course I'm a true newby on maven  
11:21 <Pbas> ho by the way my incomplete PR: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/pull/516  
11:21 <Pbas> thxs  
11:35 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
11:53 <M-yflory> Hi, can someone review my blog article please? http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Blog/Drafts/Realtime+Visual+Editing/  
11:54 <vmassol> Hi yann  
11:54 <vmassol> nice topic :)  
11:54 <vmassol> i'd put a link on " XWiki Labs team from XWikiSAS"  
11:56 <vmassol> M-yflory: it's not clear to me whether http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/RtWysiwyg currently supports CK or not  
11:56 <vmassol> is the new realtime that supports CK published yet or not?  
11:57 <vmassol> I'd put a link on "CkEditor integration 1.7"  
11:57 <vmassol> to the exo page  
11:57 <vmassol> ahah seems the answer is supported in   "Realtime Wysiwyg 1.18"  
11:58 <vmassol> s/is sipported/is that CK is supported/  
11:58 <vmassol> correct?  
11:58 <vmassol> if so then the exo page should mention this I think  
11:59 <vmassol> text and screenshot currently only mention the GWT editor  
11:59 <vmassol> ah no my bad  
11:59 <vmassol> just the text  
12:01 <vmassol> my POV on this article is that it stats a bit technical. I would be nice to introduce it first maybe in a section  
12:01 <vmassol> as a summary of https://labs.xwiki.com/xwiki/bin/view/Blog/Realtime+Collaboration  
12:02 <vmassol> anyway, whatever you do, it's good a nice to have a new article about it! :)  
12:02 <vmassol> thanks for that  
12:02 <M-yflory> Indeed, it's not clear in the text, I'll update the RtWysiwyg page on exo (we use CkEditor since RTWysiwyg 1.4)  
12:02 <vmassol> thx  
12:04 <Pbas> My boss dream about this! thxs he can show-off now  
12:04 <Pbas> Do you upload xar file ? or we must generate ourself?
